attributes.action: permit the testing of F1 racing cars at Elvington Airfield York
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Last month it was ruled at York Magistrates court that it was to noisy for any motor events to be held at Elvington Airfield, especially the testing of F1 cars.
The complaints are by the minority and they should be privilidge to have such a large organisation wanting to test in the local area. 
It is a Airfield at the end of the day and it is an emergancy landing site for the space shuttle becuase of the length of the runway, will they have to ask permission before making an emergancy landing??

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
